title: Lacrosse Stick and Ball
description: A stick and ball used in the sport of lacrosse. The ball is usually depicted as either orange or white, while the stick's color varies across emoji designs.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the lacrosse emoji presents a dynamic image of the sport, featuring a sleek, dark-colored lacrosse stick poised to strike. The ball, rendered with Apple's characteristic glossy 3D shading, appears ready to be caught or thrown, conveying a sense of action and athletic prowess.  The smooth, rounded edges of the stick and the realistic lighting on the ball make this emoji a visually engaging representation of teamwork and competitive spirit, frequently used to discuss sports, games, or physical activity.
